rdf:rdf:
人类遗传学杂志

;《人类遗传学杂志》是一本领先的国际杂志，发表有关人类遗传学的文章，包括医学遗传学和人类基因组分析，基因克隆和映射，链接分析，突变分析，进化，癌症遗传学以及基因疗法以及疾病模型或行为模型或行为的遗传和功能分析。

    ;
  • ;Associated with the Japan Society of Human Genetics.
    • ;
  • ;Also presents clinical or cytogenetic case reports, as well as reports of genetic polymorphism of biologically important genes, novel mutations found in patients with hereditary diseases or in cancer cells, and population genetics.
    • ;
  • ;Article Types are Original Articles, Brief Communications, Review Articles, Correspondences, Editorials, and Comments
    • ;
;
